heroDesc: Growing a better future for farmers
heroPara1: At Sooraj Crop Science, we are dedicated to delivering high-quality crop protection and nutrition solutions to farmers across Pakistan. As a trusted supplier of fungicides, insecticides, and micronutrients, we provide advanced and sustainable methods to ensure the health and productivity of crops from planting to harvest.
heroPara2: Crops face constant threats from insects, fungi, and nutrient imbalances, as well as unpredictable weather conditions such as heat, cold, drought, and floods. We partner with farmers to tackle these challenges, ensuring safe, nutritious, and high-quality produce.

about.whoDesc: Sooraj Crop Sciences is an agricultural solutions company dedicated to delivering reliable, research-driven products that empower farmers to achieve healthier crops, stronger yields, and long-term sustainability.
about.missionDesc: To provide innovative and effective agricultural solutions that improve crop health and maximize yield.
about.visionDesc: To become a trusted leader in crop sciences by offering science-backed products.
about.commitmentDesc: We are committed to delivering high-quality, environment-friendly crop solutions that farmers trust.
about.whyTitle: Why Farmers Trust Sooraj Crop Sciences

career.heroText: At Sooraj Crop Sciences, we empower farmers with innovation. Join our mission to improve agriculture with sustainable crop solutions.

1.title: Field Agronomist
1.desc: We’re looking for an agronomist to support farmers with crop guidance and field visits.

2.title: Crop Protection Specialist
2.desc: Help farmers diagnose crop diseases and recommend biological & chemical solutions.

3.title: Farm Outreach Coordinator
3.desc: Connect with farmers, organize events, and spread awareness about our products.

cropGallery.title: Crops That We Protect
cropGallery.subtitle: Our specialized solutions safeguard a variety of essential crops.
